channel.title: Need help please!
channel.description: Well I'm using figment and I set up my npc dialogue and everything but what I'm trying to do is figure out how to make the text show up on multiple lines. When I add another line by changing the number after the text it doesn't work or when I change the click to continue text it makes the text I put clickable. So all I want is to know how to make the text apear on different lines. Thanks.

item.title: Need help please!
item.dc:creator: @Miix_Tom Miix Tom
item.description:
@Miix_Tom wrote:

u need a npc that can say different lines at the same time…

item.title: Need help please!

item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

I don’t think that’s possible, NPC’s never talk in lines they talk like normal player one line per message.
